document.full_text: after three tries, an 86-year-old beer vendor struck out trying to prove discrimination when her employer at new york's shea stadium moved her but not her younger, able-bodied co-worker.
document.title: beer vendor strikes out at the old ballgame
lines_and_colors: after three tries, an 86-year-old beer vendor struck out trying to prove discrimination when her employer at new york's shea stadium moved her but not her younger, able-bodied co-worker.
